mapper.sql: id, phone, member_id as memberId, have_receive as haveReceive, house_id as houseId, city_id as cityId, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, red_pack_rule_id as redPackRuleId, red_pack_id as redPackId, business_order_number as businessOrderNumber, data_status as dataStatus, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate
mapper.select: SELECT rpr.id, rpr.sort, rpr.pack_num packNum, (case when rpr.member_id!=null then 1 else 0 end) isReceived, (case when rpr.business_order_number!=null then 1 else 0 end) isApply, rpr.have_receive haveReceive, rpr.business_order_number businessOrderNumber FROM dj_activity_red_pack_record rpr WHERE rpr.red_pack_id = #{redPackId} order by rpr.sort

SELECT r.end_date, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'), r.id, r.member_id memberId FROM dj_activity_red_pack_record r WHERE r.member_id IS NOT NULL AND r.business_order_number IS NULL
and r.end_date<= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 2 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') and r.end_date>= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT count(r.id) FROM dj_activity_red_pack p, dj_activity_red_pack_record r WHERE r.red_pack_id = p.id AND r.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and r.business_order_number is null
and p.source_type=#{sourceType}
